certifications.name: Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA)
certifications.granted: Cloud Native Computing Foundation (CNCF) and The Linux Foundation

certifications.granted: Cloud Native Computing Foundation (CNCF) and The Linux Foundation

certifications.description: As a benchmark for best practices in IT security, this certification covers the essential principles for network security and risk management.

certifications.name: CompTIA Linux+
certifications.description: Demonstrates basic Linux administration skill. The participant can work at the Linux command line, perform basic maintenance tasks, install and configure a workstation and connect it to a LAN, or a standalone PC or the Internet.

certifications.name: LPIC-1: Certified Linux Administrator
certifications.description: Demonstrates basic Linux administration skill. The participant can work at the Linux command line, perform basic maintenance tasks, install and configure a workstation and connect it to a LAN, or a standalone PC or the Internet.
